title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 56.5 - High-backed padded seats on buses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 56.5 - High-backed padded seats on buses

State Regulations

Notwithstanding the provisions of subdivision 3 of section
385
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law, a bus subject to a length limitation of 35 feet, and which is required to be equipped with, and is equipped with, seats at least
28 inches in height with padded backs in accordance with paragraph 3-a of
subdivision 17 of section
142
of the

Transportation Law, may exceed such length limitation by 41/2 inches for each
row of seats with such padded backs in such bus, except that no such bus shall
exceed 40 feet in total length. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
56.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
